channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Salesforce Needs to Sell Its Latest AI Vision
item.description: The cloud pioneer hopes AI agents make a splash at its Dreamforce conference and rejuvenate growth prospects.

item.title: Despite recent volatility here’s 5 reasons to be optimistic on markets says Deutsche Bank
item.description: A traditionally better fourth quarter and Fed rate cuts should support the stock market rally says Deutsche

item.title: Consumers Have a Debt Problem: Not Enough of the Right Kind
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s next interest-rate decision could be a fateful one for many consumers and in turn for debates about the health of the American s...

item.title: ‘It’s a momentous moment’: The Fed is finally about to cut rates. I’m single, 48 and ready to sell my house. Is it the perfect time?
item.description: “I had three offers over 11 months, one more frustrating than the next.”

item.title: Where to Put Your Money When the Fed Cuts Rates
item.description: What lower rates mean for the trillions of dollars in CDs and high-yield savings accounts.

item.title: ‘I don’t want to be unfair’: My mother gave me $150,000 to buy a house. One sibling wants 15% ownership. What now?
item.description: “I do not want to be unfair to my siblings, but I also do not want them to own an interest in my house.”

item.title: Why Europe Is Embracing the New American Growth Model
item.description: Following the trail of the U.S. will require more government intervention in industrial and trade policy.

item.title: Pret a Manger’s U.S. expansion sees cafe chain’s sales hit $1.5 billion
item.description: The coffee seller said one quarter of its overall sales are now generated outside the U.K.

item.title: Why Washington and Big Oil Are Investing Billions in Ammonia
item.description: The latest bet is a $1.56 billion Energy Department loan commitment for a Wabash Valley Resources ammonia project in Indiana.

item.title: ‘This flies in the face of my morals and ethics’: My father cut my sisters out of his six-figure estate. Should I push back?
item.description: “Although there is time for him to change his mind, my dad is a stubborn man.”
